name: Merge Blocks - Puzzle Game
description:
This is a block puzzle game that allows you to play all day long.

The game may seem simple, but you have to be careful and focused, otherwise you might get an error and end the game earlier.

All you need to do is tap the correct position and place the new block.

Three or more of the same blocks that are connected together will be merged into a new block.

You just keep merging blocks and you get high scores.

Go ahead and challenge the new record with your friends!
